 G  115 6271.9269757080  127 12543.8539514160
 Ab 116 6644.8751612791
 A  117 7040.0000000000
 Bb 118 7458.6201842894
 B  119 7902.1328200980


NOTES: Middle C is note #60. Frequency is in Hertz.

Here's a BASIC program to calculate an array with all of the above
frequencies (ie, so that MIDI(0), which pertains to note #0, is assigned
the value of 8.1757989156). Tuning is based upon A=440.

DIM MIDI(127)
A=440
FOR x = 0 to 127
MIDI(x) = (A / 32) * (2 ^ ((x - 9) / 12))
NEXT x
